title: Champion Page
body: How do you view others pages? some people get onto yours and you can tell when they give you exact values for mastery points and mastery grade (S-D). Mine is faded and doesn't work, how do they get it? I can only think of one way, but its to much effort.

replies.body: You aren't meant to be able to view other's "champion" tabs. Its a glitch that happens sometimes if you quickly switch between your own champ tab and theirs.
